TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InstanceContextIdleCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The instance context that has finished processing.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that is called when an object has finished processing.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use an InstanceContextIdleCallback to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an InstanceContextIdleCallback object has finished processing. When the InstanceContextIdleCallback object notifies the runtime that the InstanceContextIdleCallback has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/indigo2-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> once again. This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.NotifyIdle%2A>.
